item.title: Download Common Legal Templates
item.author: email@example.com (Author Name)
item.dc:creator: A-Bo-Bo Attorney at Law
item.description: A workman must first sharpen his tools if he is to do his work well. Our firm has compiled common legal document templates, available for free download.
item.content:encoded:
We understand that many individuals wish to attempt handling simple legal matters on their own first. The following templates are provided for your reference:

üìÅ Formal Demand Letters (Legal Notices)

  • Demand Letter for Debt Repayment (.docx)
  • Notice of Non-Renewal upon Lease Expiration (.docx)

üìÅ Contracts and Agreements

  • Standard Settlement Agreement for Car Accidents (.pdf)
  • Prenuptial Agreement Reference Template (.pdf)

Disclaimer: These templates are for reference only. For specific cases, it is still highly recommended to consult with a lawyer before signing any documents.
